title: OCE Gay Guys Unite :D
body:
Hello friends c:
I'm creating this discussion to find out if their are other active gay guys on the server, especially from my area! We could add each other and play some games together :)
A little about me:
I'm 21 and from Adelaide, Australia, I main mid and adc, and my favourite champions are {{champion:44}} and {{champion:81}}! I started playing ranked recently and am currently Diamond 2, trying to climb up to Master

<3 Sacky

replies.body: It's almost as if you're a different person in every post Sacky :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YeiMuuI4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-13T08:35:08.379+0000)
>
> It's almost as if you're a different person in every post Sacky :^)

Sometimes I think I can be too mean, so I try and make jokes, but no one laughs at my jokes.
:(

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YeiMuuI4,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-04-13T08:38:36.095+0000)
>
> Sometimes I think I can be too mean, so I try and make jokes, but no one laughs at my jokes.
> :(

I'm here for you Sacky <3 we should play some time :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YeiMuuI4,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-04-13T08:43:32.906+0000)
>
> cos ur a giant fgt thats why

i mak this thread to unite with gay people cause gay ppl r nice k

Can we all agree that this thread is gay?

Of course I mean no harm here.

Ufufufu.
(Gets downvoted twice) "Hey at least we aren't racist, amirite guys? heh"

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YeiMuuI4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-13T06:37:02.195+0000)
>
> (Gets downvoted twice) "Hey at least we aren't racist, amirite guys? heh"

Downvotes to me are like upvotes, because that means I have made people upset, therefore #Winning.
I am a man identifying as a lesbian.  I have decided to come out and proclaim that women are super hot
